metadata.name: HackTool - QuarksPwDump Dump File
metadata.comment: Detects a dump file written by QuarksPwDump password dumper

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\sam-')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('.dmp')))

output.summary: Detects a dump file written by QuarksPwDump password dumper
